api/BOOSEapp.AppCanvas.html.title: Class AppCanvas | boosedocumentation
api/BOOSEapp.AppCanvas.html.summary: Class AppCanvas Namespace BOOSEapp Assembly BOOSEapp.dll public class AppCanvas : ICanvas Inheritance object AppCanvas Implements ICanvas Inherited Members object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.MemberwiseClone() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) object.ToString() Constructors AppCanvas(int, int) Initialises a new drawing canvas of the specified size. public AppCanvas(int width, int height) Parameters width int height int Properties PenColour public object PenColour { get; set; } Property Value object Xpos public int Xpos { get; set; } Property Value int Ypos public int Ypos { get; set; } Property Value int Methods Circle(int, bool) Draws a circle at the current pen position with the given radius. public void Circle(int radius, bool filled) Parameters radius int filled bool Clear() Clears the entire canvas to white. public void Clear() DrawTo(int, int) Draws a line from the current position to the specified X and Y coordinates. public void DrawTo(int x, int y) Parameters x int y int MoveTo(int, int) Moves the pen to the specified X and Y coordinates without drawing. public void MoveTo(int x, int y) Parameters x int y int Rect(int, int, bool) Draws a rectangle centered on the current position. public void Rect(int width, int height, bool filled) Parameters width int height int filled bool Reset() Resets the pen position to the default coordinates. public void Reset() Set(int, int) public void Set(int width, int height) Parameters width int height int SetColour(int, int, int) Changes the colour of the drawing pen and brush. public void SetColour(int r, int gVal, int b) Parameters r int gVal int b int Tri(int, int) public void Tri(int width, int height) Parameters width int height int WriteText(string) public void WriteText(string text) Parameters text string getBitmap() Returns the current drawing bitmap to be displayed in the UI. public object getBitmap() Returns object

api/BOOSEapp.AppCommandFactory.html.summary: Class AppCommandFactory Namespace BOOSEapp Assembly BOOSEapp.dll Custom command factory for BOOSEApp. Returns unrestricted command versions for drawing operations. public class AppCommandFactory : CommandFactory, ICommandFactory Inheritance object CommandFactory AppCommandFactory Implements ICommandFactory Inherited Members object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.MemberwiseClone() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) object.ToString() Methods MakeCommand(string) Creates and returns the command object for the given type. public override ICommand MakeCommand(string commandType) Parameters commandType string The name of the command (e.g., "circle"). Returns ICommand The matching unrestricted command, or the base implementation if not overridden.

api/BOOSEapp.URCircle.html.title: Class URCircle | boosedocumentation
api/BOOSEapp.URCircle.html.summary: Class URCircle Namespace BOOSEapp Assembly BOOSEapp.dll Unrestricted Circle command — removes radius validation from AppCircle. public class URCircle : CommandOneParameter, ICommand Inheritance object Command CanvasCommand CommandOneParameter URCircle Implements ICommand Inherited Members CommandOneParameter.param1 CommandOneParameter.param1unprocessed CanvasCommand.yPos CanvasCommand.xPos CanvasCommand.canvas CanvasCommand.Canvas Command.IsDouble Command.program Command.parameterList Command.parameters Command.paramsint Command.Set(StoredProgram, string) Command.Compile() Command.ProcessParameters(string) Command.ToString() Command.Program Command.Name Command.ParameterList Command.Parameters Command.Paramsint object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.MemberwiseClone() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) Constructors URCircle() Blank constructor for factory instantiation. public URCircle() URCircle(Canvas, int) Constructor to initialise with canvas and radius. public URCircle(Canvas c, int radius) Parameters c Canvas Canvas this command affects. radius int Circle radius. Methods CheckParameters(string[]) Override to ensure only one parameter is accepted (same as AppCircle). public override void CheckParameters(string[] parameterList) Parameters parameterList string[] Parameters for this command. Execute() Executes the unrestricted circle command. public override void Execute()

api/BOOSEapp.URDrawTo.html.title: Class URDrawTo | boosedocumentation
api/BOOSEapp.URDrawTo.html.summary: Class URDrawTo Namespace BOOSEapp Assembly BOOSEapp.dll Unrestricted DrawTo command – allows drawing lines to any coordinates without restriction. public class URDrawTo : CommandTwoParameters, ICommand Inheritance object Command CanvasCommand CommandOneParameter CommandTwoParameters URDrawTo Implements ICommand Inherited Members CommandTwoParameters.param2 CommandTwoParameters.param2unprocessed CommandOneParameter.param1 CommandOneParameter.param1unprocessed CanvasCommand.yPos CanvasCommand.xPos CanvasCommand.canvas CanvasCommand.Canvas Command.IsDouble Command.program Command.parameterList Command.parameters Command.paramsint Command.Set(StoredProgram, string) Command.Compile() Command.ProcessParameters(string) Command.ToString() Command.Program Command.Name Command.ParameterList Command.Parameters Command.Paramsint object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.MemberwiseClone() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) Constructors URDrawTo() Blank constructor for factory instantiation. public URDrawTo() URDrawTo(Canvas, int, int) Constructor for direct instantiation. public URDrawTo(Canvas c, int x, int y) Parameters c Canvas x int y int Methods CheckParameters(string[]) Ensures exactly two parameters are provided. public override void CheckParameters(string[] parameterList) Parameters parameterList string[] Execute() Executes unrestricted drawing (no line-length or boundary limits). public override void Execute()

api/BOOSEapp.html.title: Namespace BOOSEapp | boosedocumentation
api/BOOSEapp.html.summary: Namespace BOOSEapp Classes AppCanvas AppCommandFactory Custom command factory for BOOSEApp. Returns unrestricted command versions for drawing operations. Form1 URCircle Unrestricted Circle command — removes radius validation from AppCircle. URDrawTo Unrestricted DrawTo command – allows drawing lines to any coordinates without restriction. URMoveTo Unrestricted MoveTo command – allows movement to any coordinates without canvas boundary limits. URRect Unrestricted Rectangle command – removes size restrictions from AppRect.

index.html.summary: This is the HOMEPAGE. Refer to Markdown for how to write markdown files. Quick Start Notes: Add images to the images folder if the file is referencing an image.
